title: PM expresses sadness at loss of lives in Turkiye coal mine blast
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 15 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif Saturday expressed profound grief at the loss of precious lives in an explosion at a coal mine in Turkiye.
In a tweet on his Twitter handle, he said, “I express our profound sadness at the loss of precious lives in an explosion at a coal mine in Turkiye’s Bartin province.”
“Our thoughts & prayers are with the bereaved families & the Turkish people. May those still trapped are rescued at the earliest.”
